Uproar turns his head over towards Tucson and Leo Prime and then simply lie=
s back down with his head resting on his paws.  He sniffles to clear his st=
uffy nose and then looks to the door as Quickstride creeps in to check up o=
n him.

" Hey how are ya feeling?"

Uproar looks to him.

" Uh, not so hot.=
  You got good timing, check out what's going down with those two....  AAHH=
CHOO!"

Quickstride steps to the side to avoid getting hit by Uproar's ener=
gy blast.

" Gazoontyte.  Wow that doesn't sound so good.  Oh boy, the know=
ledgable lion against the mighty dragon.  I dunno, that big guy may not be =
Hydras but a dragon is a dragon no matter what shape and no matter how many=
 heads they have.  And not all of them breathe fire.  But who needs fire wh=
en ya got a  mouth full of dagger sharp teeth, fangs and claws with diamond=
 strength talons on all fours.  One of those in the underbelly and kiss you=
r spark goodbye."

Uproar nods.

" I so hope it doesn't come ta that.  But =
look at the look on his muzzle...  Yikes..."  

Perpetually on the move and=
 constantly busy.

nsforms into SUV mode and reverses toward the door.

up.   They didn't start scap and they get pinned for it.  If anyone wants m=
e, I'll be near the river, out back.  I need some personal space."

h that he rolls out in haste.

 an angry stare of his own.  His tail continues to snap in an agitated mann=
er yet he doesn't lash out in full draconic fury, as it would seem.
>

I seriously hope you are not intending to undermine me Leo. "

lly on the move and constantly busy.

k his head as he looked over at WINDLORD, "No, you are talking

tlight but I believe that Tuscon is talking about Elita."

aningfully, "You said she is too young and Tuscon said you
> were right but=
 let's hear what she has to say and that if she wishes
> to be a part of th=
e plan then we should respect that, no matter how
> strange it may seem."
>=

!

> Anyone paying attention to LEO could see him bristle, the lion part =
of
> him starting to come to the fore. He looked as if he were about to say=

> something when WING CALIBER placed a hand lightly on his shoulder and

directed his attention to WHEELIE who by this time had slid past RAT
> TRAP=
 and STRAIGHT SHOT.
> 
> > And not drawing a weapon, "If you two think that=
 is worth an 'oops' I'd hate
> > to see you take things out of your caboose=

> > can do, I'll say I'm sorry to the two=
 of you. Since you both can't do that,
> > I'll say it's not worth being a =
brat. If you two can barely work so well,
> > then I'd hate to see you in a=
 shell. No offense, but if you can't do that,
> > it's not worth trying to =
hit you up for chat."
> >
> > Leaning back against the wall, then turning h=
is attention back to LEO PRIME,
> > and crossing his arms over as the discu=
ssion turned back to RODIMUS.
> >
> 
> LEO looked back from WHEELIE to TUSC=
ON, visably brining his own anger
> into check. "Clear the room." LEO PRIME=
 said to the others. He glanced
> at WING CALIBER, "And keep an optic on RA=
T TRAP, STRAIGHT SHOT and
> WHEELIE, I will need to talk with them as well.=
"
> 
> WING CALIBER nodded as he gestured for the others to leave the room =
as
> LORD ELDER left pursing his lips thoughtfully.
> 
> There was a brief =
glance from LEGACY and SANTON from the other room.
> They were completely i=
solated from what was goin on in this room, but
> TUSCON's outburst clearly=
 had been heard in there. They quickly went
> back to work trying to save S=
ILVERBOLT's life.
> 
> LEO PRIME just looked at TUSCON as he waited for the=
 room to clear his
> arms hanging loosely at his sides. His optics on the M=
aximal Prime who
> was clearly becoming more unstable as time progressed, t=
he concern for
> a brother Maximal prime was warring with the anger he had =
burning in
> his spark, and it was written all over his faceplate.
>

<div>Straight Shot leaves the room as ordered as does Rattrap who go of=

ns are caught by Nightshift who seems to be frustrated as well.  He tr=
ansforms into SUV mode and reverses toward the door. </div>
<div><br><=
/div>
<div>" Totally messed up.   They didn't start scap and they get =
pinned for it.  If anyone wants me, I'll be near the river, out back. =
 I need some personal space."</div>
<div><br></div>
<div>With that he =
rolls out in haste.</div>

<div>Tucson meets Leo Prime's exp=
ression with an angry stare of his own.  His tail continues to snap in=

uld seem.</div>
